title: Make Poetry Great Again: The Poems of Donald J. Trump
description: As Donald J. Trump says himself, "I have the best words." In this groundbreaking collection of poetry, Trump makes poetry great again. Pedrito Ortiz has compiled The Donald's most poetic turns of phrase and combined them to make the best poetry you'll read this election cycle. Featuring an opening poem by rogue wordsmith Sarah Palin, Trump's poems explore some of his favorite subjects: winning, the wall, Rubio's sweating problem, and women.
author: Donald J. Trump
